Articles.Content:
hey guys, i am searching for a vtol that you launch off from the runway.

then fly it into orbit

and fly to eve

land at eve

and launch at eve with the vertical launch

my main point to this vtol need to be that you can launch it in hover mode from the eve's surface to then fly it into orbit using the normal fly modes

als you need to dock this ship for refueling etc.

the ships looks need to be awesome not just random parts you see. it needs to be aerdynamic. does somebody knows a ship what has these points? if it can launch from eve it can be launched from everything. please help me out.

about the fueling stationts closeness. you dont need to worry about that, I have several fuelstations on the surface of eve and in orbit. on of my lander rockets could land, refuel, launch, refuel again and dock at spacestation withouth a problem.
You may want to ask for less and no I do not know where you can get one
